subject: Fires and Firefighters
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The University of South Carolina announced it would not hold its traditional “Tigerburn” pep rally before its game with its archrival Clemson because of a beach fire in Ocean Isle Beach, N.C., that killed seven of the universities’ students last month. The rally, at which students burn a massive papier-mâché Clemson Tiger, has been a tradition at South Carolina for four decades.
